bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:00 AM. Morning recess is from 10:00 to 10:20 AM. Lunch is from 11:30 to 12:20 PM.  For Kindergarden to 3rd grader, and school ends at 2:10 PM. For 4th and 5th graders, school end at 2:40 PM.
